items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t tell whether Mary dyed her hair or not.
Tom couldn\'t understand what Mary was trying to say.
When Tom woke up, he found that Mary had disappeared.
When was the last time you heard French being spoken?
I\'ll put the kettle on and we\'ll have a cup of tea.
If you can\'t say anything nice, don\'t say anything.
Tom grabbed his umbrella and headed for the elevator.
Tom has always had trouble reading between the lines.
It was a lot more difficult than I expected it to be.
Tom had changed so much that I didn\'t recognize him.
Tom had hoped that he wouldn\'t be chosen to do that.
Tom was aiming his pistol at Mary when John shot him.
Tom was busy translating some documents for the boss.
Tom was definitely the best-looking guy in our class.
We have to live with the consequences of our actions.
We have to live with the consequences of our choices.
We just have to make sure Tom is planning to be here.
We need to find out if Tom is planning on helping us.
Tom might be here somewhere, but I haven\'t seen him.
Tom said Mary wasn\'t planning to do that by herself.
